issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

	at org.apache.aries.application.itest.twitter.TwitterQuery.start(TwitterQuery.java:43)

comments.body: I have fixed the version of twitter4j used for the twitter bundle to be from 2.0.8 up to 2.1.0. It was importing 0.0.0 to infinity. I suspect that 2.1.0 of twitter4j isn't backward compatible with 2.0.8, but I haven't checked this. It is possible the resolver was grabbing a back level too.
